sentences.english: There exist wide tidal fiats in Qiantang Estuary.
sentences.chinese: 钱塘江河口存在广阔的潮滩地。

sentences.english: Surfing the Qiantang tides is an age-old tradition in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 在钱塘潮上冲浪在浙江省是一种古老的传统。

sentences.english: Scientists say, this year's Qiantang River tides are the largest in nine years.
sentences.chinese: 科学家表示，今年的钱塘潮是九年里最大的。

sentences.english: Head office is located in the scenic southern bank of Qiantang River in Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 总公司座落于风景秀丽的杭州钱塘江南岸。

sentences.english: Over the centuries the vantage point for watching the tides has changed.
sentences.chinese: 钱塘观潮的地点，古今有所不同。

sentences.english: It can be anticipated that the Qiantang Estuary t…
sentences.chinese: 钱塘江河口湾基本的发育趋势是逐渐束狭变浅。

sentences.english: Qian Tangjiang connects Hai Hang to carry the economic development that saves to Zhejiang has important sense.
sentences.chinese: 钱塘江通海航运对浙江省的经济开发具有重要意义。

sentences.english: Qiantang River flows is the world's most famous tidal, Xiao Shan is experience resorts.
sentences.chinese: 钱塘江潮是世界最著名的涌潮，萧山是观潮胜地。

sentences.english: Since ancient times, qiantang river tide, called world wonders.
sentences.chinese: 钱塘江大潮，自古以来被称为天下奇观。

sentences.english: Do you know something about the stolen silver in qiantang?
sentences.chinese: 钱塘县库银被盗之事你可清楚？

sentences.english: River bed regulation in strong tidal reaches of the Qiantang river is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对钱塘江强潮河段江道缩窄治理进行研究。

sentences.english: Before turning back to Shanghai, stop at the Qiantang River and overlook the Six Harmonies Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 返回上海前，会驻足钱塘江，俯瞰六和塔。

sentences.english: Mr Wang, do you keep it a secret about the stolen silver in qiantang?
sentences.chinese: 王大人，王大人，钱塘县库银失窃之事捂住了吧？

sentences.english: You can have a magnificent view of the Qiantang River from the top of the Six Harmonies Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 从六和塔的顶层看，钱塘江的壮丽景色尽收眼底。

sentences.english: Water levels on the Qiantang River and all its tributaries exceeded the safety level at 7 am on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 钱塘江及所有支流水位周四早上七点超过警戒水位。

sentences.english: Who is the Qian Tang River, the river a daughter flowers.
sentences.chinese: 钱塘江畔是谁家，江上女儿全胜花。
